Name: Twin Balls
About the game: You control two balls that rotate on their axis and fly down through various obstacles. You need to slow down their fall by clicking the mouse so that they successfully pass through obstacles. For successfully passing an obstacle, you get points. On your way through the obstacles, you can collect coins and save up for new skins for balls.
